title: Digital Citizenship
description: Enhance your French speaking skills with phrases suitable for discussions on digital citizenship. Focus on clear pronunciation and responsible intonation.
instructions: Below, you'll find a list of phrases that are key to engaging in conversations about digital citizenship in French.
Your task is to record yourself speaking each phrase.
Ensure your pronunciation matches the provided text as closely as possible.
Try to maintain an informative and thoughtful speaking pace.
After recording each phrase, listen to your recording and compare it to the text.
Focus on intonation, clarity, and the articulate expression of digital ethics and safety.
Repeat the recording process as many times as needed to improve your pronunciation.
